title: ADC/TOP/JUNGLE Required For Trialing
body:
Hey!,
At the moment we are in need of an ADC/TOP/JUNGLE Who are interested in joining a ranked 5's team. We will be holding the game tonight, having the captain as one support, and the coach as the other. We will be trialing all lanes and roles apart from support. Thank you very much and please add me on League for more information.
Current roles already filled:

**One team:
Top

Mid

Support
**


**Second Team:

Jungle

Mid

Ad Carry

Support
**

replies.body: I main JG, secondary Top and my rarely played roles are Mid and ADC ( I use to play mid a lot and I don't have many Champs.)
Hey, Im a Mid main {{champion:74}} {{champion:7}} {{champion:55}} but i also (Used) to main jg {{champion:9}} {{champion:121}}
i am a top lane main secondary role jg and looking to join a ranked 5s team
Hi there I am an ADC main looking to join a ranked team. Unfortunately I cannot trial for your team tonight as I  busy. If you are interested feel free to add me. IGN :AHQ PICCABOO
